content.question: Which of the following is accurate according to the chart?

choices.label: Between 1980 and 2040, China’s actual fertility rate will rise significantly, but the estimated fertility rate would have remained stable without the one-child policy.
China’s fertility rate would have been much higher prior to 2005 without the one-child policy.
China's fertility rate declined significantly between 1985 and 2010.
China’s fertility rate will be higher in 2005 than it was in 1980.

content.answer: China's fertility rate declined significantly between 1985 and 2010.
